website_summaries.verdict: Another high-quality option for those seeking a sunless tan extender that has a bronze-colored infusion.
pros: Formula includes bronzing hues to give skin a natural-looking tan
cons: Application can be messy and difficult for some

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this stuff. I am a mobile spray tan technician and it is hard to spray myself. I use this lotion and I am never orange and the color is beautiful! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Chait

customer_reviews.title: Gives a great tan and it's not orange YAY!
customer_reviews.text: Really works well and I am already naturally tan. Be sure to apply with good lighting to avoid streaks, and as the directions state, go light on knees and elbows. It does have that funny smell so drown yourself in your favorite scent afterwards. That smell goes away eventually.!
customer_reviews.author: Lissette

customer_reviews.title: Either that or combine this with your favorite lotion. And definitely give it 10-15 minutes to ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't understand why other reviewers mentioned using lotion with this but I do now--it is so much darker than the other Norvell sunless tanning color extender. Which means you have to be much more careful because it will blotch easier than a lighter colored lotion. I found that mixing the two worked very well. Either that or combine this with your favorite lotion. And definitely give it 10-15 minutes to dry before putting on clothes. It has very little scent (and a good one!) and I've had no irritation to my skin with this brand. I love Norvell!
customer_reviews.author: L. Kowalski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This worked great with no orange! Very light tan over the two weeks before the wedding. Fabulous product. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Read 4Ever

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting DARK tan!
customer_reviews.text: This is my FAVORITE self tanner. It is marketed as a daily/gradual tanner but there is great color after one use! Some other daily’s take quite some time to show, and you never achieve the color you want. I’m as white as a paper and Norvell gets me as tan as a beach-living suntanning-every day girl in a few uses! It is long lasting, I use it for 2 days in a row and then don’t need to apply again for 6 days. Be sure to moisturize with a tan friendly moisturizer in between though!!! This and Skinny tan are the only products worth your money for home tanning. I’ve tried them all, trust me. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Bad Investment
customer_reviews.text: This is a mess. It is a thin, gel-like substance that just goes on mucky and stays that way. It requires way too much effort to blend in and is so hard to get off your hands. Its slimy consistency makes it all too easy to spatter around and collect on odd surfaces during application so that you may later find a rueful stain on a cabinet front or passing blouse. Not one of my better finds, to say the least. Norvell can do far better than this.
customer_reviews.author: harken

customer_reviews.title: The best sunless tanning lotion I’ve used so far
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough good things about this sunless tanning lotion. It’s perfect for any skin tone because of the purple undertones so it will not leave you orange, as long as you apply evenly and make sure you rub it in, it’s streak free. I applied after a shower and let it air dry for about 20 minutes before getting dressed and it did not rub off or stain my clothes or bedding. I woke up with great, even color. Will definitely order again and I highly recommend especially if your skin has red tones to it like mine.
customer_reviews.author: Kristyn

customer_reviews.title: I love the self tanner
customer_reviews.text: I love the self tanner. It's gradual. I have fair skin and it does not look orange. It will kind of rub on your clothes. And if you get wet it will take off the tint but not the self tanner gradual change in your skin .
customer_reviews.author: Angie Adkins

customer_reviews.title: The absolutely the best product ever made!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best self tanner I have ever tried. Never again will I ever use anything else. My legs have always been two shades lighter than the rest of my body. Just after one application, I'm finally the same color all over. Yeah!
customer_reviews.author: SandraL

customer_reviews.title: This product has a nice fragrance. Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product has a nice fragrance. Great product. It prolongs the tan for days. I shower daily. It lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Poppi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love love love it! Works great! Smells good too! This is the second time I've bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra J Cooley

customer_reviews.title: Natural Tan
customer_reviews.text: I’m fair skinned, freckles from head to toe but this looks like a natural tan on my skin. First application made me look almost olive skinned and every application thereafter gave me a lovely brown tan. No orange and the product almost smells like grapes to me. I’ve always used Norvell spray tan booths and my favorite color is Venetian. Love it! I also love Fake baked products but this is my number 1!!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Instant results
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is incredible! I’ve been doing spray tanning for the past 8 years, both airbrush and spray booths. I’m officially done with spray and using this stuff forever! I apply it with an applicator mitt and it gives perfect coverage. No streaks, no orange fake color, doesn’t get on my clothes and I don’t need to stress about not getting accidentally wet for 6 hours like with spray.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Pacheco

customer_reviews.title: Realistic color
customer_reviews.text: I love how this looks like real color. You donhabe to be careful - just a little will work for you- it's very dark , I can see where I'm applying it and where I over applied ( ankles, knees) no stinky odor either. Finally a tan cream that works .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Price is better than Salon pricing.
customer_reviews.text: tubes are a little smaller than what I can purchase at my local salon and it seems a little bit thinner than last year, but the effect is still amazing. I can apply it everyday for 3 or 4 days and it looks so real. Then just one a week or so after that.
customer_reviews.author: Gma Amy

customer_reviews.title: CUSTOMER FOR LIFE !
customer_reviews.text: A MUST BUY ! This lotion is amazing. I bought my first bottle at my tanning salon right when virus started, it makes me look so good, now on my second, people have idea I use a lotion, they always tell me, I have an awesome tan 😎
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute best self tanner lotion I have ever found. After trying everything Sephora and Ulta has with no luck, I came across this at my local tanning salon. It moisturizes and tans at the same time and has purple undertones so you don’t look orange. And I can get it cheaper here on amazon which is even more great. I use this everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product it doesn't have an orange tint and it doesn't smell bad I place this on at night before I go to bed can I wake up in the morning and put a moisturizing lotion on and the color is absolutely beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Bree Hoene

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: The best!!! people always ask me my ethnicity or if i have been on vacation when i use this!! never orange always perfectly brown!! i use this to do my eyebrows too 😂
customer_reviews.author: Snoflake

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a tan
customer_reviews.text: My daughter in law wore this for her wedding. Great color and looks like a suntan. No orange tones at all.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This does a job at both creating a tan and extending your tan. I usually alternate it with the mousse. It's not super moisturizing so you may still need to use lotion if you have dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: melinurse

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST self tanner I’ve ever used. This sounds crazy but you will appreciate this info if you use this product. Spray your hands with Windex to remove the stains on your hands. It’s amazing 😉
customer_reviews.author: G Allen

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I am a hairstylist and I always buy this from a distributor accept this time. This tanner can't be the real deal! It goes on super dark and 24 hours later when you shower it all comes off. Very strange. Don't buy it
customer_reviews.author: tinavandeusen

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this product from somewhere else before and I was bummed when they quit selling it. I was happy to find it on Amazon. I've used other more expensive self tanning products and none of them have worked as well as this one. No orange color or streaking, no weird smell. You have to apply it a couple of times for a darker color but I've been really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Fallout52

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to apply!  Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I am light complected, so this product did not make me look instantly tan - But, I after applying lightly each day for several days, I do have a healthy (not orange) tan. My only complaint is that my age spots (I'm in my mid-50s) get darker, but that would happen with any sunless tanner. Very pleased. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite tan
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried many tanning products but this one does not strike. Smells good goes on well put on PJs sleep and the next day you’ll be beautiful tan.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Not orange! Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and the norvell vivid. It's awesome! This is not as thick as the vivid one... Color is great for a pale Irish /German skin. Once you put it on there is instant color and then it leaves a nice color. Not orange!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at a tanning salon and I noticed results in the same day, this one I have used for 3 days and still no different
customer_reviews.author: Layla Gianelli

customer_reviews.title: It is amazing. I will never use anything else
customer_reviews.text: I'm a very fair skinned red-head who always burns, never tans. I gave up on trying to tan in beds or outside, & I turned to self tanning products. I have tried them all. Seriously. They are all really streaky, too orange, etc. I've been using the Norvell Venetian Sunless Tanner for about a year. It is amazing. I will never use anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: It takes a bit for it to dry as I guess they all do that it gives a really pretty color. Definitely put it on with a mitt not your hands. And it seems to be lasting so so far so good and I am a melanoma survivor so I'm not allowed to San tan anymore which I absolutely love and like having color so this is working great.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Fowler

customer_reviews.title: I love this self tanning lotion
customer_reviews.text: I love this self tanning lotion. Excellent and immediate results. Authentic looking dark tan shade. Not orange, but a deep rich dark bronze tan. Must wash hands after using this lotion, and use a towel designated for this purpose because stain does not come out easily. Make sure you let it dry thoroughly before putting on clothes. Overall I give it 5 stars just because of the beautiful color.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon D.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite sunless tanning lotion! Doesn't come off on clothing as bad as others and the color is pretty close to my natural tan coloring.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S

customer_reviews.title: Never Again
customer_reviews.text: Never again will I buy a sunless tanning product. Oh, it definitely makes your skin darker, but it magnifies every defect, it does not make your skin feel moisturized either. It's messy, ugly, gross.
customer_reviews.author: Suerose

customer_reviews.title: Love Norvell Products
customer_reviews.text: They never disappoint. I used them when I owned my indoor tanning studio. This goes on nice and smells great. Awesome color!
customer_reviews.author: Tamey Greene

customer_reviews.title: Best of best
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the best blends easily and is a good alternative to bb creams and foundations!
customer_reviews.author: firewaterstarter

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: This works really well for me. Gives me a natural color. I use it almost daily and have had it for a little while. You use such a small amount which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Grillo

customer_reviews.title: Nice color
customer_reviews.text: This tanning lotion is pretty good. Doesn’t streak, good smell. Make sure to wash your hands really good if you don’t use a mit. I use a pumice stone to get it all off my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. Literally using it 3 times a week leaves you tanned. It doesn’t leave a gross smell behind, and no streaks. I actually prefer the cream over the full spray tan. New favourite.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lefebvre-Varzari

customer_reviews.title: Great sunkissed color!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Great tan coloring lasts for a week easy! Goes on so smooth & has never been streaky! It also doesn’t have that “self tan” smell like most products do
customer_reviews.author: Meagan L. Schultz

customer_reviews.title: moisturizing. Tan
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Best on the market. Exfoliate first very important. And keep moiturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy D

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: if your looking for one that gives plenty of color this one does it!color is good but I go light when I put it on!-you can always add more if you like the dark look
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: Worked for Me
customer_reviews.text: I was able to extend my tan by well over a week and a half, sometimes 2. I found it easy to use, no streaking and I was more than satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Hartwell

customer_reviews.title: Liquid consistency, not a lotion
customer_reviews.text: Not creamy, it is almost a liquid gel. Very dark stain, cannot be used during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Salmon

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated
customer_reviews.text: Made skin look dirty & applied it per instructional videos. For 5 weeks now, I have been very frustrated in numerous, unsuccessful attempts to find Sellers Contact info to return product.
customer_reviews.author: LadyM

customer_reviews.title: Best Self Tanner!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only self tanner that doesn’t smell bad after application and that doesn’t turn you ORANGE!
customer_reviews.author: Gina From TN

customer_reviews.title: Left my skin feeling AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Not only did it extend the life of my spray tan it moisturized it so well!!! It doesn't seem like it would when it comes out and you put it on at first give it a bit and your skin will feel so soft!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Still orange
customer_reviews.text: Even after applying lotion first, this product still makes my heels orange looking. My legs look good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DEAL EXCELLENT QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Very natural looking tan. I normally tan in indoor beds and spray. This product is great for in between sessions and goes on smoothly/evenly. Make sure to rub in really well and wash your hands after. Or purchase a mitt to blend.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan L Damon

customer_reviews.title: This is the best self-tanner I have used so far.
customer_reviews.text: The color is pretty and natural, not at all orange. It fades gradually. Not as patchy as other tanners I have tried. The only issue I have is with my feet looking funky after I go for a run, but it touches up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Julie C. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: The color is very natural. No streaks. Company s customer service was delightful, sent me a nice thank you note.
customer_reviews.author: Mel C

customer_reviews.title: Evens out uneven spray tan results overnight! It's very ...
customer_reviews.text: Evens out uneven spray tan results overnight! It's very sparkly though so it's quite obvious you are wearing it. It also is heavily tinted so it will run or streak if you are sweating (from say a night out dancing?!) Overall the product does what it says it'll do and that's why I use it :)
customer_reviews.author: Resident

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fast shipping 👍 this is perfect for when your feeling extra pale and want to wear some shorts and need a quick fix ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bronzed glow!
customer_reviews.text: My go to self tanner! Perfect bronzed color instantly! I do not use on my face...only my body.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Holt

customer_reviews.title: Natural, instant, safe tan in minutes
customer_reviews.text: I love this and it's a natural looking tan on my pale white. It doesn't leave an offensive odor or turn your skin orange like most self-tanning creams.
customer_reviews.author: KASANDRA JIMENEZ

customer_reviews.title: you must try it
customer_reviews.text: I loved the way it made me look after the first use it toned my skin and did not streak and I am blinding white not to mention I wore it to a workout class and it didn’t make me smell bad. It has brokers to give you an immmediate color boost I am getting more love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Self-Tanner
customer_reviews.text: I love this gradual some tanner. Works well and smells good.
customer_reviews.author: Loves Horses

customer_reviews.title: Smell is great and gave gradual results
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it once so far but it seems ok. Smell is great and gave gradual results.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl v

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Nice color and easy to apply with a mit. You can build your color over a couple days of application. The smell isn't bad, but similar to other products I have used. I put in on overnight and shower in the morning so it's not an issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This product is by far thee best tanning product I’ve ever used, and I’ve tried them all. Better than Coola, st Tropez, vita Liberata..... Has a beachy coconut smell but dissipates after a while. No orange color and much more natural than the products I mentioned above.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never turns orange.
customer_reviews.text: I love this self tanning lotion. Gives me a gradual tan without looking fake. Never orange. I would order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not nearly as much color as I would have liked
customer_reviews.text: I love the norvell Venetian for spray tan so was excited to try this out. It doesn’t give very much color at all , but I guess if you use just to extend the spray tan it works well, but I wouldn’t purchase it again ..
customer_reviews.author: Hipsy Gypsy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Favorite self tanner! I’m a big fan of spray tans and this is the color I use. I used it three days in a row to achieve the color I wanted. It does come out super dark and requires extra attention while applying to avoid getting streaky but the color is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley folino

customer_reviews.title: Smell and glowing color!
customer_reviews.text: This product is AMAZING!! You don’t look orange! I’ve got so many compliments on how tan I look! I used it after showering, I waited a day between using a again. It is best to wash your hands as you go , it will stain your hands , not terrible!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Best in the game
customer_reviews.text: Norvell has the best sunless lotion out there. It is a dark tan that you see immediately. It is a little intense though so if you have super sensitive skin don't use it on your face.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Looks so real I had to tell ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Looks so real I had to tell friends and family my legs were fake baked!!!
customer_reviews.author: NancyAnn

customer_reviews.title: Love this Self-Tanner
customer_reviews.text: It gives me great color without the smell and dries very quickly. Definitely the best I have ever used!
customer_reviews.author: B'ham Mom

customer_reviews.title: but i like it to be able to make a little difference ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not seem to make me any darker. Maybe if i did it so many days in a row it would.. but i like it to be able to make a little difference by the next day and this did not. The mousse is way better.
customer_reviews.author: christy

customer_reviews.title: ... tried several products and this is by far my favorite! I tan with other Norvell products at home ...
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I have tried several products and this is by far my favorite! I tan with other Norvell products at home that give me better results than getting it done at a tanning salon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not try this product out had some on hand
customer_reviews.text: I did not try this product out because I had some on hand I’m sure it was a great product and would buy it again if needed
customer_reviews.author: deborah michaud

customer_reviews.title: Norvell Sunless is great
customer_reviews.text: I first bought this product after getting a spray tan, it is wonderful for me because it is very light scented and I have a problem with scented lotions, and it made my tan last for weeks. I still use the product, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Honeycutt

customer_reviews.title: Happy Custumer
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and looks natural I mix it with my body cream and works miracles
customer_reviews.author: Marie Helen Ledbetter

customer_reviews.title: Best self tanner EVER!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best self tanner I have ever used and the only one I will buy from here on! Great bronze color - no orange! You see results within 8 hours. I would highly recommend to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Angela S.

customer_reviews.title: No Endurance
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't last at all. One time use only. As soon as you shower or put any lotion on over it, it comes off. The description calls it "Endurance Color", I totally disagree with that statement. I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE

customer_reviews.title: Best tanning lotion ever
customer_reviews.text: Love love love!!! I get compliments all the time on how natural it looks and not orange!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! Gives a natural tan. No streaks and not orange. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and works so well. My skin looks so dark with no orange
customer_reviews.author: Ory

customer_reviews.title: Quality, availability and on time.
customer_reviews.text: Love this self tanner. No streaks, no smell and lasts approx. 5 days . Seller is consistent, I always receive it as promised and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Tube arrived damaged with product oozing out.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product before and like it, but was disappointed when it arrived damaged--needed it ASAP and now have to return.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne B. Sittema

customer_reviews.title: Love It! Smells Really Good
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I've been buying it for several years. It makes my skin such a pretty tan color!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t turn you orange
customer_reviews.text: Hands down my favorite tanning product. I love violet based self tanners. Long lasting, doesn’t turn you orange. It’s perfect
customer_reviews.author: Candace Keenan

customer_reviews.title: Best selftanner on the market
customer_reviews.text: Hands down best selftanner on the market. Great natural looking tan. Doesn't smell the best but color is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amy E Jusevitch

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I don't tan at all I just burn, so tanning beds are out. This gives a beach tan glow. I'll never use anything but this product. No orange color or streaks. ❤❤❤❤
customer_reviews.author: Malinda E.

customer_reviews.title: A great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised by this product!! It has a beautiful bronzer and I have a handsome tan. It was not orange at all!! Very pleased with this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Smooth application
customer_reviews.text: Product goes on smoothly and hours later shows a smooth soft Color. Would recommend

customer_reviews.title: Stains towels and sheets
customer_reviews.text: Stains towels , sheets and clothing. I Broke out in a rash.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia P.

customer_reviews.title: Great service!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very convenient way to get my tanning products. Very efficient service! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: D. Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Love all the Norvell Products
customer_reviews.text: Love all the Norvell Products. I'm new to them an so far no streaks and looks so natural too.
customer_reviews.author: Don Demers

customer_reviews.title: Best sunless tanner ever
customer_reviews.text: Best sunless tanner ever!! Color is natural looking, no orange. I CrossFit and lift and the color stays even after super sweaty sessions, no streaks or weird lines. Also has a nice, natural fade to it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! My tanning salon sales this stuff for a much pricier amount. Bought thru her then another one here on Amazon ! I get so many compliments, it a tiny glitter specs that in the right lighting you an totally see it! It smells yummy and really does enhance the glow you already have
customer_reviews.author: Keri Giordano

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Great tan without the streaks or sun damage!
customer_reviews.author: KK Tank

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This product gives a great, bronze, sun kissed look to your skin. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: busy mom

customer_reviews.title: Great sunless tan
customer_reviews.text: I love the color this product gives. Very natural looking. I did notice it drying out my skin though so I had to back off on frequency of use.
customer_reviews.author: Craig S.

customer_reviews.title: Great non-orange color
customer_reviews.text: Love the color you get over night! This is better than the boost!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Farber

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: I first tried this from a tanning salon, they highly recommended. I loved it and found it on Amazon. Great, immediate color with no oranging.

customer_reviews.title: I love this! Looks like I've been in the sun
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Looks like I've been in the sun. No streaks or turning orange.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Does exactly what it says it will do. Just ordered a second one.

customer_reviews.title: Great color and enhances a spray tan
customer_reviews.text: This is great for making a spray tan last longer. Very good color, not orange!

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It does moisturize! But also found it brought out more orange tones!

customer_reviews.title: Natural color for fair skin
customer_reviews.text: This product gives my fair skin a natural looking glow - not orange.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Color Enhancer !!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product.The color you get is dark and natural looking tan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Norvell Venetian Sunless CC Tanning Color Extender Moisturizing Lotion with Violet and Brown Tone Instant Bronzers, 8.5 fl.oz
feature_bullets: EXQUISITE AND EXOTIC: This unique, award-winning Norvell Venetian sunless tan extender / enhancer deposits DHA comprised of violet and brown hues that ingeniously mimic the stunning and exotic bronze skin tones found in the sultry, sun-soaked shores of the European Riviera. A gradual tanning cream that’s steps above all others. Bronzers add an instant bronze hue while DHA works to slowly build a deep tan.

BREATH OF FRESH AIR: Tend to your tan while breathing in the intoxicating and addicting beachy aroma of Norvell proprietary scent Paradise Breeze. You’ll feel like you’ve been instantly transported to the idyllic seascapes of the Italian Amalfi coast.

ENVELOP SKIN WITH ANTI-AGING INGREDIENTS: Bursting at the brim with beautifying botanical oils of grapeseed and hempseed, including olive-derived squalane, antioxidant vitamins C and E, and essential extracts of green tea, lemon peel, strawberry, and banana fruit, this age-defying tanning extender lotion will envelop your buffed, bronzed body with succulent, moisture and much-needed nourishment.

DHA DIFFERENCE FOR EVERY BODY: Cool, innovative formulation produces both cool and warm undertones that compliment every skin tone, while premium-grade DHA ingredient locks into top layer of skin, optimizing sunless tanning performance for a rich, long-lasting, luscious tan.

TANS, AND TONES: Get summer-sexy skin that’s tight, toned, and tanned from head-to-tippy-toe with this luxe tan extender enriched with body-buffing glycolic and alpha-hydroxy acids, plus pin-perfecting caffeine to help kick cellulite to the curb. Our self tanning lotions deliver outstanding color and nourish your skin too.
